Package com.hedera.sdk.contract

Class HederaContract

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hedera.sdk.contract.HederaContract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class HederaContract
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class manages all aspects of interacting with a Smart Contract on Hedera Hashgraph
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      HederaKeyPair adminKey
      The HederaKeyPair representing the contract's administration key initially null the state of the instance and its fields can be modified arbitrarily if this key signs a transaction to modify it.
      long amount
      initial number of tinybars to put into the cryptocurrency account associated with and owned by the smart contract
      HederaDuration autoRenewPeriod
      A HederaDuration representing the auto renew period of a smart contract initially null the instance will charge its account every this many seconds to renew for this long
      byte[] constructionParameters
      Parameters supplied when creating a smart contract (in the solidity format)
      long contractAccountAccountNum
      The contract's account number
      long contractAccountRealmNum
      The contract's account's realm number
      long contractAccountShardNum
      The contract's account's shard number
      long contractNum
      the smart contract number
      HederaTimeStamp expirationTime
      A HederaTimeStamp containing the expiration time for a smart contract initially null extend the expiration of the instance and its account to this time (no effect if it already is this time or later)
      HederaFileID fileID
      The HederaFileID containing the smart contract's bytecode initially null A copy will be made and held by the contract instance, and have the same expiration time as the instance.
      byte[] functionParameters
      Parameters supplied when running a function (in the solidity format)
      long gas
      the gas to pay to run a smart contract or smart contract function
      HederaTransactionID hederaTransactionID
      The HederaTransactionID of the last transaction to be run here
      long initialBalance
      The initial balance of the smart contract's account
      long maxResultSize
      max number of bytes that the a smart contract call result might include.
      HederaKeyPair newRealmAdminKey
      The HederaKeyPair representing the realm's administration key initially null if realmID is null, then this the admin key for the new realm that will be created
      HederaAccountID proxyAccountID
      ID of the account to which this account is proxy staked.
      long realmNum
      the realm number for the smart contract realm in which to create this (leave this null to create a new realm)
      long shardNum
      the shard number for the smart contract
      HederaTransactionAndQueryDefaults txQueryDefaults
      Default parameters for a transaction or query

      This method runs a transaction to execute a function on a smart contract
      HederaContractFunctionResult callLocal​(long gas, byte[] functionParameters, long maxResultSize)
      Runs a smart contract function on a single node and returns the result as a HederaContractFunctionResult object returns null if an error occurred in the event of an error, check the value of this.precheckResult to determine the cause of the error
      HederaContractFunctionResult callLocal​(long shardNum, long realmNum, long contractNum, long gas, byte[] functionParameters, long maxResultSize)
      Runs a smart contract function on a single node and returns the result as a HederaContractFunctionResult object returns null if an error occurred in the event of an error, check the value of this.precheckResult to determine the cause of the error
      boolean callLocal​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
      Runs a query to call a smart contract function locally (on a node) If successful, the method populates the properties this object depending on the type of answer requested
      boolean callLocalAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to call a smart contract function locally (on a node), requesting only an answer If successful, the method populates the properties this object
      boolean callLocalCostAnswer()
      Runs a query to call a smart contract function locally (on a node), without a state proof If successful, the method populates the cost property of this object
      boolean callLocalCostAnswerStateProof()
      Runs a query to call a smart contract function locally (on a node), with a state proof If successful, the method populates the cost property of this object
      boolean callLocalStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to call a smart contract function locally (on a node), requesting a stateproof If successful, the method populates the properties this object including a state proof
      HederaTransactionResult create​(long shardNum, long realmNum, HederaFileID fileID, long initialBalance, long gas, byte[] constructorParameters, HederaDuration autoRenewPeriod)
      Creates a smart contract in the simplest possible way
      HederaTransactionResult create​(long shardNum, long realmNum, HederaFileID fileID, long initialBalance, long gas, byte[] constructorParameters, HederaDuration autoRenewPeriod, java.lang.String contractMemo)
      Creates a smart contract in the simplest possible way
      HederaTransactionResult create​(HederaTransactionID transactionID, HederaAccountID nodeAccount, long transactionFee, HederaDuration transactionValidDuration, boolean generateRecord, java.lang.String memo, HederaSignatures sigsForTransaction)
      This method runs a transaction to create a smart contract instance
      boolean deleteKey​(HederaKeyPair key)
      Deletes a HederaKeyPair from this object
      byte[] getByteCode()
      Gets the bytecode of the smart contract specified by the shardNum, realmNum and contractNum properties of this class, returns null if an error occurred.
      byte[] getByteCode​(long shardNum, long realmNum, long contractNum)
      Gets the bytecode of a smart contract returns null if an error occurred.
      boolean getByteCode​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
      Runs a query to get the bytecode for a given smart contract If successful, the method populates the bytecode, cost and stateProof for this object depending on the type of answer requested
      boolean getByteCodeAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Gets the bytecode for the smart contract, requesting only an answer If successful, the method populates the bytecode and cost for this object
      boolean getByteCodeCostAnswer()
      Requests only a cost for a simple answer for a bytecode query If successful, the method populates the cost for this object
      boolean getByteCodeCostAnswerStateProof()
      Requests only a cost for an answer with stateproof for a bytecode query If successful, the method populates the cost for this object
      boolean getByteCodeStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Gets the bytecode for the smart contract, requesting a state proof If successful, the method populates the bytecode, stateproof and cost for this object

      HederaContractID getHederaContractID()
      Gets the shard, realm and contractNum of this contract in the form of a HederaContractID
      boolean getInfo()
      Get info for the contract which is specified by the shardNum, realmNum and contractNum properties of this class in the event of an error, check the value of this.precheckResult to determine the cause of the error Note: You may perform a "getInfoCostAnswer" in order to ascertain the cost of the query first The cost could be cached and refreshed from time to time, there is no need to look it up before each getInfo query
      boolean getInfo​(long shardNum, long realmNum, long contractNum)
      Get info for a smart contract in the event of an error, check the value of this.precheckResult to determine the cause of the error Note: You may perform a "getInfoCostAnswer" in order to ascertain the cost of the query first The cost could be cached and refreshed from time to time, there is no need to look it up before each getInfo query
      boolean getInfo​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
      Runs a query to get information for a given smart contract If successful, the method populates the properties this object depending on the type of answer requested
      boolean getInfoAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to get information for a given smart contract, requesting only an answer If successful, the method populates the properties this object
      boolean getInfoCostAnswer()
      Runs a query to get the cost of getting information for a given smart contract without a state proof If successful, the method populates the cost property of this object
      boolean getInfoCostAnswerStateProof()
      Runs a query to get the cost of getting information for a given smart contract with a state proof If successful, the method populates the cost property of this object
      boolean getInfoStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to get information for a given smart contract, requesting a stateproof If successful, the method populates the properties this object including a state proof
      java.util.List<HederaKeyPair> getKeys()
      Gets a list of HederaKeyPair

      The precheck result ResponseCodeEnum of a transaction
      java.util.List<HederaTransactionRecord> getRecords()
      Get records attached to this contract Note: If no records are found, the function returns an empty array if however an error occurred, it will return null
      java.util.List<HederaTransactionRecord> getRecords​(long shardNum, long realmNum, long contractNum)
      Get records attached to a given contract Note: If no records are found, the function returns an empty array if however an error occurred, it will return null
      boolean getRecords​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
      Runs a query to get records attached to a smart contract If successful, the method sets the records property, cost and state proof if requested
      boolean getRecords​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType, HederaContractID contractID)
      Runs a query to get records attached to a smart contract If successful, the method sets the records property, cost and state proof if requested
      boolean getRecordsAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to get records attached to an account without a state proof If successful, the method sets the records property and cost
      boolean getRecordsAnswerStateProof()
      Runs a query to find out the cost of getting records attached to an account with a state proof If successful, the method sets the cost
      boolean getRecordsCostAnswer()
      Runs a query to find out the cost of getting records attached to an account without a state proof If successful, the method sets the cost
      boolean getRecordsStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to get records attached to an account with a state proof If successful, the method sets the records property, cost and state proof

      • newRealmAdminKey

        public HederaKeyPair newRealmAdminKey
        The HederaKeyPair representing the realm's administration key initially null if realmID is null, then this the admin key for the new realm that will be created

      • adminKey

        public HederaKeyPair adminKey
        The HederaKeyPair representing the contract's administration key initially null the state of the instance and its fields can be modified arbitrarily if this key signs a transaction to modify it. If this is null, then such modifications are not possible, and there is no administrator that can override the normal operation of this smart contract instance. Note that if it is created with no admin keys, then there is no administrator to authorize changing the admin keys, so there can never be any admin keys for that instance.

      • gas

        public long gas
        the gas to pay to run a smart contract or smart contract function

      • amount

        public long amount
        initial number of tinybars to put into the cryptocurrency account associated with and owned by the smart contract

      • functionParameters

        public byte[] functionParameters
        Parameters supplied when running a function (in the solidity format)

      • fileID

        public HederaFileID fileID
        The HederaFileID containing the smart contract's bytecode initially null A copy will be made and held by the contract instance, and have the same expiration time as the instance.

      • initialBalance

        public long initialBalance
        The initial balance of the smart contract's account

      • proxyAccountID

        public HederaAccountID proxyAccountID
        ID of the account to which this account is proxy staked. If proxyAccountID is null, or is an invalid account, or is an account that isn't a node, then this account is automatically proxy staked to a node chosen by the network, but without earning payments. If the proxyAccountID account refuses to accept proxy staking at the given fraction, or if it is not currently running a node, then it will behave as if both proxyAccountID and proxyFraction were null. initially null

      • autoRenewPeriod

        public HederaDuration autoRenewPeriod
        A HederaDuration representing the auto renew period of a smart contract initially null the instance will charge its account every this many seconds to renew for this long

      • expirationTime

        public HederaTimeStamp expirationTime
        A HederaTimeStamp containing the expiration time for a smart contract initially null extend the expiration of the instance and its account to this time (no effect if it already is this time or later)

      • constructionParameters

        public byte[] constructionParameters
        Parameters supplied when creating a smart contract (in the solidity format)

      • maxResultSize

        public long maxResultSize
        max number of bytes that the a smart contract call result might include. The run will fail if it would have returned more than this number of bytes.

      • call

        public HederaTransactionResult call​(HederaTransactionID transactionID,
                                    HederaAccountID nodeAccount,
                                    long transactionFee,
                                    HederaDuration transactionValidDuration,
                                    boolean generateRecord,
                                    java.lang.String memo,
                                    HederaSignatures sigsForTransaction)
                             throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method runs a transaction to execute a function on a smart contract
        Parameters:
        transactionID - the HederaTransactionID for the transaction
        nodeAccount - the HederaAccountID of the account of the node to which the transaction is submitted
        transactionFee - the fee paid by the client to run the transaction
        transactionValidDuration - the duration of the transaction's validity as HederaDuration
        generateRecord - boolean to indicate if a record should be generated as a result of this transaction
        memo - String memo to include in the transaction
        sigsForTransaction - The signatures for the transaction as a HederaSignatures
        Returns:
        HederaTransactionResult
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - in the event that communication with the node wasn't successful

      • bodyToSignForCall

        public com.hederahashgraph.api.proto.java.TransactionBody bodyToSignForCall​(HederaTransactionID transactionID,

                                                                            HederaDuration transactionValidDuration,
                                                                            boolean generateRecord,
                                                                            java.lang.String memo)
        This method returns the body of a function call transaction so that it can be signed

        transactionFee - the fee paid by the client to run the transaction
        transactionValidDuration - the duration of the transaction's validity as HederaDuration
        generateRecord - boolean to indicate if a record should be generated as a result of this transaction
        memo - String memo to include in the transaction
        Returns:
        TransactionBody

      • create

        public HederaTransactionResult create​(HederaTransactionID transactionID,
                                      HederaAccountID nodeAccount,
                                      long transactionFee,
                                      HederaDuration transactionValidDuration,
                                      boolean generateRecord,
                                      java.lang.String memo,
                                      HederaSignatures sigsForTransaction)
                               throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method runs a transaction to create a smart contract instance
        Parameters:
        transactionID - the HederaTransactionID for the transaction
        nodeAccount - the HederaAccountID of the account of the node to which the transaction is submitted
        transactionFee - the fee paid by the client to run the transaction
        transactionValidDuration - the duration of the transaction's validity as HederaDuration
        generateRecord - boolean to indicate if a record should be generated as a result of this transaction
        memo - String memo to include in the transaction
        sigsForTransaction - The signatures for the transaction as a HederaSignatures
        Returns:
        HederaTransactionResult
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - in the event that communication to the node resulted in an error

      • getByteCode

        public boolean getByteCode​(HederaTransaction payment,
                           HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
                    throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Runs a query to get the bytecode for a given smart contract If successful, the method populates the bytecode, cost and stateProof for this object depending on the type of answer requested
        Parameters:
        payment - a HederaTransaction message to indicate how this query will be paid for, this can be null for Cost queries
        responseType - the type of response requested from the query
        Returns:
        Boolean indicating success or failure of the query
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - should an exception occur during communication with the node

      • getByteCodeAnswerOnly

        public boolean getByteCodeAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment)
                              throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Gets the bytecode for the smart contract, requesting only an answer If successful, the method populates the bytecode and cost for this object
        Parameters:
        payment - the HederaTransaction payload containing payment information for the query
        Returns:
        Boolean indicating if query was successful or not
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - should a communication error occur with the node

      • create

        public HederaTransactionResult create​(long shardNum,
                                      long realmNum,
                                      HederaFileID fileID,
                                      long initialBalance,
                                      long gas,
                                      byte[] constructorParameters,
                                      HederaDuration autoRenewPeriod)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a smart contract in the simplest possible way
        Parameters:
        shardNum - the shard in which to create the smart contract
        realmNum - the realm in which to create the smart contract
        fileID - the HederaFileID identifying the file containing the bytecode from which to create the smart contract instance
        initialBalance - the initial balance for the smart contract's account
        gas - the maximum amount of gas to use for the creation
        constructorParameters - , a byte array containing the parameters for the construction of the smart contract
        autoRenewPeriod - , a HederaDuration to specify how often the smart contract should renew itself
        Returns:
        HederaTransactionResult
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in the event of an error

      • create

        public HederaTransactionResult create​(long shardNum,
                                      long realmNum,
                                      HederaFileID fileID,
                                      long initialBalance,
                                      long gas,
                                      byte[] constructorParameters,
                                      HederaDuration autoRenewPeriod,
                                      java.lang.String contractMemo)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a smart contract in the simplest possible way
        Parameters:
        shardNum - the shard in which to create the smart contract
        realmNum - the realm in which to create the smart contract
        fileID - the HederaFileID identifying the file containing the bytecode from which to create the smart contract instance
        initialBalance - the initial balance for the smart contract's account
        gas - the maximum amount of gas to use for the creation
        constructorParameters - , a byte array containing the parameters for the construction of the smart contract
        autoRenewPeriod - , a HederaDuration to specify how often the smart contract should renew itself
        contractMemo - , the memo to store against the smart contract
        Returns:
        HederaTransactionResult
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in the event of an error

      • call

        public HederaTransactionResult call​(long gas,
                                    long amount,
                                    byte[] functionParameters)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls a smart contract function in the simplest possible way
        Parameters:
        gas - , the maximum amount of gas to use for the call
        amount - , number of tinybars sent (the function must be payable if this is nonzero)
        functionParameters - , which function to call, and the parameters to pass to the function
        Returns:
        HederaTransactionResult
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in the event of an error

      • getInfo

        public boolean getInfo()
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Get info for the contract which is specified by the shardNum, realmNum and contractNum properties of this class in the event of an error, check the value of this.precheckResult to determine the cause of the error Note: You may perform a "getInfoCostAnswer" in order to ascertain the cost of the query first The cost could be cached and refreshed from time to time, there is no need to look it up before each getInfo query
        Returns:
        boolean
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in the event of an error

      • getInfo

        public boolean getInfo​(long shardNum,
                       long realmNum,
                       long contractNum)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Get info for a smart contract in the event of an error, check the value of this.precheckResult to determine the cause of the error Note: You may perform a "getInfoCostAnswer" in order to ascertain the cost of the query first The cost could be cached and refreshed from time to time, there is no need to look it up before each getInfo query
        Parameters:
        shardNum - , the shard number of the smart contract
        realmNum - , the realm number of the smart contract
        contractNum - , the account number of the smart contract
        Returns:
        boolean
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in the event of an error

        byte array
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in the event of an error

      • callLocal

        public HederaContractFunctionResult callLocal​(long gas,
                                              byte[] functionParameters,
                                              long maxResultSize)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Runs a smart contract function on a single node and returns the result as a HederaContractFunctionResult object returns null if an error occurred in the event of an error, check the value of this.precheckResult to determine the cause of the error
        Parameters:
        gas - , the maximum amount of gas to pay for this function execution
        functionParameters - , parameters for running the function
        maxResultSize - , max number of bytes that the result might include. The run will fail if it would have returned more than this number of bytes.
        Returns:
        HederaContractFunctionResult
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in the event of an error

      • callLocal

                                              long realmNum,
                                              long contractNum,
                                              long gas,
                                              byte[] functionParameters,
                                              long maxResultSize)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception

        realmNum - , the realm number of the smart contract
        contractNum - , the account number of the smart contract
        gas - , the maximum amount of gas to pay for this function execution
        functionParameters - , parameters for running the function
        maxResultSize - , max number of bytes that the result might include. The run will fail if it would have returned more than this number of bytes.
        Returns:
        HederaContractFunctionResult

        java.lang.Exception - in the event of an error
